title: Visual Arts
description: Photography is a technique that uses light. I have worked as a commercial photographer, capturing images of large commercial events. I also founded a photography club with friends in high school and organized several large club events in the form of photography lectures. During this period, I received many awards from the school. Personally, I am particularly interested in classical photography.
quote: The eye should learn to listen before it looks.

quote.description: In the photography club, not only Visual Arts activities are conducted, but also video recording. And we completed several groups of microfilm shooting and post-production during high school.
quote.text: The foundation of film art is editing.
